a.style: background-color: rgb(200, 234, 251); display: inline-block; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; color: white; border: 1px solid white; font-family: Myriad Pro; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 5px; margin-left: 5px; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-image: url("images/FB-white.png"); background-size: 13px 25px; width: 38px; height: 38px;

background-color: rgb(202, 236, 252); height: 38px; width: 38px; display: inline-block; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; color: white; border: 1px solid white; font-family: Myriad Pro; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 5px; margin-left: 5px; background-image: url("images/Twitter_logo_white.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: 25px 25px; background-position: center center;

background-color: rgb(202, 236, 252); height: 38px; width: 38px; display: inline-block; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; color: white; border: 1px solid white; font-family: Myriad Pro; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 5px; margin-left: 5px; background-image: url("images/instagram-white.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-size: 25px 25px;

background-color: rgb(202, 236, 252); height: 38px; width: 38px; display: inline-block; text-align: center; font-size: 32px; color: white; border: 1px solid white; font-family: Myriad Pro; font-weight: bold; border-radius: 5px; margin-left: 5px; background-image: url("images/flickr-logo.png"); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-position: center center; background-size: 30px 15px;
